 2024-07142024-06-17HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations and the Medical Devices Regulations (Recalls, Establishment Licences and Finished Product Testing)
PrecisRegulations Amending AMENDING THE FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS AND THE MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS (RECALLS, ESTABLISHMENT LICENCES AND FINISHED PRODUCT TESTING) in order to (1) amend the food and drug regulations to make mandatory the expectations currently set out in guidance regarding the timing of, and information to be included in, voluntary recall reports; impose similar reporting requirements for mandatory recalls; replace the list of recognized foreign authorities with a list to be maintained on the Government of Canada website and incorporated by ambulatory reference; and exempt specified complex drug products from aspects of the finished product testing requirements; and (2) amend the Medical Devices Regulations to remove the requirement to report recalls where the device is not expected to cause injury; make mandatory the expectations currently set out in guidance regarding the timing of, and information to be included in, voluntary recall reports; impose similar reporting requirements for mandatory recalls; set out recordkeeping requirements for both voluntary and mandatory recalls; allow terms and conditions to be imposed on a MDEL; require MDEL holders and applicants to provide any other name under which they previously conducted medical device-related activities; require MDEL holders and applicants to provide and keep current a contact email address; and Minor non-substantive and/or consequential amendments will also be made to both regulations to better align the English and French versions and ensure consistent terminology.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0136 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
